com.mygdx.hanto.implementation.common

Class HantoState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.hanto.implementation.common.HantoState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HantoStateDevelopment

    public abstract class HantoState
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class describes the state of the Hanto Game and all the state classes of the specific hanto game should extend this class.
